variables.name: titleSeparator
variables.text: The separator between the dynamic title and static titleSuffix in the title attribute.

variables.name: titleSuffix
variables.text: The suffix - an i18n key - that will be displayed after the titleSeparator.

variables.name: description
variables.text: The description of the current page - an i18n key - that will be displayed in the title attribute.

methods.name: getMetaDescription
methods.text: Gets the document page description, i.e. the content of the meta type="description" tag

methods.name: setDescription
methods.text: Updates the document page description, i.e. the content of the meta type="description" tag
